definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey
(idiom) one's actions are in keeping with what one says
uniform resource locator (URL), i.e. web address
pinyin: yi1 zhi4 zi1 yuan2 ding4 zhi3 qi4

sentences.english: This approach leads to misalignment between the business goals and the developed services.
sentences.chinese: 这个方法将导致业务目标和所开发的服务间的不一致。

sentences.english: Keep the cable coils stacked in the same order as they were when they were on the drum.
sentences.chinese: 在鼓轮上保持钢索盘的旋转方向与原来一致。

sentences.english: Verbs have to agree with their subjects.
sentences.chinese: 动词的形格数要与主语保持一致。

sentences.english: A is for Amen, anointing we agree.
sentences.chinese: 是阿们，我们一致的恩膏涂抹。

sentences.english: But there are discrepancies in the timeline.
sentences.chinese: 但是在有关的时间先后问题上存在不一致的地方。

sentences.english: For these, it is essential that coordination for data types takes place.
sentences.chinese: 对于这些组件，保持数据类型的一致性是非常重要的。

sentences.english: The two countries combined together against their enemy.
sentences.chinese: 这两个国家联合起来一致对敌。

sentences.english: Both of you have to discard prejudices before reaching agreement.
sentences.chinese: 你们双方只有放弃偏见才能达成一致。

sentences.english: The development of corporates should be accordance with the demand of society.
sentences.chinese: 公司的发展也要与社会的需要一致。

sentences.english: A noble professional virtue is in accord with the fundamental interests of the Party and the people.
sentences.chinese: 崇高的职业道德是与党和人民的根本利益相一致的。

sentences.english: Experts agreed it was possible Mr Putin had gone under the knife.
sentences.chinese: 专家一致认为普京是动过刀了。

sentences.english: Another advantage in Russia is consistency, Bulcke said.
sentences.chinese: 薄凯说，俄罗斯的另外一个优势是政策的一致性。

sentences.english: A2K: When it's a question of money, everybody is of the same religion.
sentences.chinese: 当涉及到金钱问题，每个人的信仰都是一致的。

sentences.english: However, theory and reality don't always match up, especially in the world of software.
sentences.chinese: 然而，理论和现实不总是一致的，尤其在软件世界里。

definition: in keeping with/in accordance with/tallying with/in line with/to agree with/to accord with/to conform to/to correspond with/to manage/to handle
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
to be a good fit/to be identical with/to adjust oneself to/to fit in
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
